identity.name: Global Telecom
identity.tagline: Premium Electronics for the Modern Home

theme.strategy: Premium Light: High brightness, deep contrast text, gold accents. Avoids 'sterile' white by using warm off-whites and rich textures.

headings.usage: All section titles, hero headlines. Letter-spacing: -0.02em.

body.usage: Paragraphs, UI elements, buttons. Clean and geometric.

primary.name: Midnight Navy
primary.usage: Primary buttons, Footer background, Text headings

layout_strategy.spacing: Generous. Section padding: py-24 or py-32. Gap: gap-8 or gap-12.
layout_strategy.grid: Bento Grid for products. Asymmetric layouts for 'About' section.

elements: Glassmorphism content card aligned left or center
Grayscale logos that turn color on hover
Hover: Zoom effect + Glass overlay with details
Glass card overlay with Address & WhatsApp button

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use 'backdrop-blur-xl bg-white/60 border border-white/40 shadow-xl' for cards floating over images.
visual_enhancers.gradients: Subtle gold-to-transparent gradients on borders only. No full-bg gradients.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid borders in slate-200 for structure.

assets.icons: Use Lucide-React. Thin stroke (1.5px) for elegance.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Playfair Display' font via Next.js Font optimization.
Ensure all text over images has a glass backing or heavy shadow for readability.
The 'WhatsApp' button must be sticky on mobile (bottom right).
Use the provided image URLs. Do not use placeholders.
Translate key CTAs to Hindi (e.g., 'Call Now' / 'अभी कॉल करें') in small subtext.
Prioritize the 'About' section higher up for SEO as requested.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic 'Inter' font for headings.
Ensure mobile responsiveness for the 'Bento' grid (collapse to 1 col).
